channel.title: Making Server
channel.description:
ok i'm helping a friend make a new server from scratch and we got just about everything up and working but we can't get the staffs like fire staff to give infinite runes it just has a ? where infinite sign should be and it says you don't have enough runes when you try to cast a spell anyone know how to make so it gives infinite runes?
[b][u]wow this forums is unhelpful beyond belife if you guys don't want to help me don't post stuff like this ok all i need to know is how to make staffs give infinite runes if your not going to tell don't post[/u][/b]

item.title: Making Server
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“Hidendra, post:4, topic:229731”]Java is universal; meaning if you learn it you can do almost anything you want in Java, and not have to learn “how to make staffs”; so you just know how to modify a config file ?
Also by looking at the source code (assuming it’s clean code) anyone (assuming they have the knowledge) can add onto that said source code, and improve on it.[/quote]No, I’ve seen moparscaper’s turn clean code into the shithole code it is today.

[quote=“Goth Wolf, post:8, topic:229731”][quote author=bcdutton link=topic=302300.msg2425541#msg2425541 date=1220573113]

	public static vo gibstaf()
	{
		infinitestaf = tru!;
	}

Add that in …process
[/quote]

Thank you for helping i appriciate it rest of you thanks for nothing[/quote]Lol @ a moparscaper being an asshole to people. That wont work btw, “vo” would result in an error. It should be void.

Read full topic

item.title: Making Server
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Java is universal; meaning if you learn it you can do almost anything you want in Java, and not have to learn “how to make staffs”; so you just know how to modify a config file ?
Also by looking at the source code (assuming it’s clean code) anyone (assuming they have the knowledge) can add onto that said source code, and improve on it.

Read full topic
